Dear Parents,

Due to popular demand, Valley Academy is opening a 4th all day kindergarten class!!
We currently have 8 spots available! Valley Academy has a student cap in each class and a cap in the entire school so overcrowding does not impede learning. Kindergarten classes start Monday August 24th.
Please share and tell your friends!

Valley Academy is the only ALL day public Kindergarten school in the area. We feel this extra half day is critical to our children's foundational knowledge so they can succeed that much more as they travel upward through other grade levels.

Valley Academy is a free public school separate from the Washington County School District. Valley is its own district.

Valley Academy has bus 5 routes that include all of Hurricane, LaVerkin, Toquerville, Anderson Junction, Leeds, Virgin, Rockville, Springdale, and Coral Canyon area.

Please call us if you have any questions.

Everyone is welcome to join us for launch day on October 20th at 9AM in the school playground area.

Apologies for these pics being late. The folks from BACA (Bikers Against Chikd Abuse) rose into Valley on their super cool motorcycles, talked to our kiddos about their purpose, and we watched them mount up and ride off.

BACA is a group of local riders who come together to support victims of child abuse. They told our kids that all they need to do is call, and their BACA brothers and sisters will be there for them.

They passed out coloring books, and did a fun demonstration about how we feel safer and braver when we have people we trust standing by us.
